environment_variables.LINENO: The current line number in the script
environment_variables.REFGENOMEDIR: The directory containing the reference genome
environment_variables.ANALYSIS: The type of analysis to perform
environment_variables.PICARDIR: The directory containing the Picard tools
environment_variables.INPUTDIR: The directory containing the input files
environment_variables.SAMPLEFILENAMES: The file containing the sample file names
environment_variables.SORTMERGETOOL: The tool to use for sorting and merging
environment_variables.REVERTSAM: Whether to revert the SAM file
environment_variables.IGVDIR: The directory containing the IGV files
environment_variables.NOVODIR: The directory containing the Novoalign tools
environment_variables.PBSCPUALIGNWGEN: The walltime for alignment of whole genome
environment_variables.PBSQUEUEWGEN: The queue for alignment of whole genome
environment_variables.PBSCPUALIGNEXOME: The walltime for alignment of exome
environment_variables.PBSQUEUEEXOME: The queue for alignment of exome
environment_variables.BWADIR: The directory containing the BWA tools
environment_variables.NOVOINDEX: The index for the reference genome for Novoalign
environment_variables.BWAALNINDEX: The index for the reference genome for BWA
environment_variables.SAMPLECN: The library name for the sample
environment_variables.SAMPLELB: The sequencing library for the sample
